## proteinAbundance

`proteinAbundance(ns:v)` or `p(ns:v)` denotes the abundance of the protein designated by the value +v+ in the namespace +ns+, where +v+ references a gene or a named protein family.



### Examples


    p(HGNC:AKT1)


    p(SFAM:"AKT Family")
